Brathan Zilmer was a retired warrior inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Brathan was the guildmaster for the Fellowship of Innkeepers during the mid-to-late 14 century DR. He held the title of "Master of Hospitality" within the guild and worked out of Fellowship Hallâ€“their headquarters in the Castle Ward.
In addition to his duties as guildmaster, Brathan also owned and operated the Pampered Traveler inn on the Street of Bells.
